entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon and ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h late in the afternoon.
